entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Overcast. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
